title: Itai no wa Iya nanode Bougyoryoku ni Kyokufuri Shitai to Omoimasu.
altTitle: I hate being in pain, so I think I'll make a full defense build.
I Hate Getting Hurt, So I Put All My Skill Points Into Defense
Bofuri: I Don't Want to Get Hurt, so I'll Max Out My Defense.
痛いのは嫌なので防御力に極振りしたいと思います。

externalLinks.url: https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/痛いのは嫌なので防御力に極振りしたいと思います。
